snippet: President Obama will celebrate his 51st birthday in true political fashion, holding a party at his Chicago home with a bunch of strangers who made campaign donations to be there.
abstract: Campaign Memo; President Obama will celebrate his 51st birthday in true political fashion by holding a party at his Chicago home and inviting strangers who made campaign donations.
lead_paragraph: President Obama will celebrate his 51st birthday in true political fashion, holding a party at his Chicago home with a bunch of strangers who made campaign donations to be there.

headline.seo: Obama’s Birthday Party as Fund-Raising Opportunity
headline.main: For the President, a Birthday Party With a Price Tag
headline.print_headline: For the President, A Birthday Party With a Price Tag
